speaker: Teacher
content: Good morning everyone. Welcome to class.

speaker: Teacher
content: Today we are going to learn about fractions. Does anyone know what a fraction is?

speaker: Student1
content: Its like a piece of something?

speaker: Teacher
content: Thats right. A fraction represents a part of a whole.

speaker: Teacher
content: Exactly! Half a pizza would be one-half or one over two.

speaker: Student2
content: What about three slices out of eight?

speaker: Teacher
content: That would be three-eighths. Very good!
